data.author: Sam Levenson
data.quote: Don't watch the clock, do what it does, keep going.

data.author: Carol Burnett
data.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

data.author: Charles R. Swindoll
data.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.

data.author: St. Jerome
data.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.

data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
data.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

data.author: Helen Keller
data.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

data.author: Nikos Kazantzakis
data.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.

data.author: Bradley Whitford
data.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.

data.author: Og Mandino
data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

data.author: Og Mandino
data.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

data.author: Ralph Marston
data.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
data.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.

data.author: Thomas A. Edison
data.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

data.author: Ayn Rand
data.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

data.author: Sam Levenson
data.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

data.author: Norman Vincent Peale
data.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.

data.author: Arthur Ashe
data.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

data.author: Robert H. Schuller
data.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

data.author: Bo Jackson
data.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
